hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Carpenters' tent#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #treasure thrown by Princess Zelda# is #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Have you ever tried hammering the ground or wall in a room with Torch Slugs, Flare Dancers, Tektites, Walltulas, Scrubs or Deku Babas?

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #Barinade#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Second Right Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: I've heard Ganon dislikes lemon-flavored popsicles.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Gerudo Card# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Compass Room Side Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Game Key# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Map of the Fire Temple# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Impa's House#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the path to Termina is a one-way trip.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Second Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #10# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #5# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Biggoron Sword#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Magic Meter#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Lullaby Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Deku Stick#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Biggoron Sword#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path of time.
